She is suffering from arthritis on both her knees and has trouble with her ambulation and lives with her elderly sister. THKMC is looking for a 3 single mattress and pillows to improve her living condition. If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Qhairah Qhaliesah (Case Manager) at 9177 6614 or Qhairahqhaliesah@thkmc.org.sg Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Qhairah Qhaliesah (Case Manager) at 9177 6614 or Qhairahqhaliesah@thkmc.org.sg Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: Pan with lid
description:
The pan will be utilize as part of our community initiative, Masak-Masak, run by the residents themselves. Every Thursday, residents will gather at our community hub to prepare the ingredients, cook and have lunch together. The program encourages friendship and solidarity among residents, young and old. Children and youth would drop by to have a meal together too. 

As the initiative is reaching out to more residents, they need an additional pan to accommodate the team expanding. The current pan they have is nearing to its wear-tear age and get burns easily. Hence, they need a halal and stove-induction friendly pan with lid to continue their passion of cooking and generosity of looking out for one another through food.

name: Halal rice cooker
description:
643 community hub is a space in the Yio Chu Kang neighbourhood where residents connect and build relationships with one another.

As the hub invites more and more residents to join us in our programs and initiatives, the hub is also starting to grow out of its rice cooker. The rice cooker we are currently holding on to is too small to support the number of residents that the hub is inviting. 

The community here at 643 community hub hopes that as the friends and community here at Yio Chu Kang grow, there will be a donor out there who is willing to give their rice cooker a second chance and donate it to 643 community hub.
